articles.title: Apple’s new AppleCare One subscription covers multiple devices at once - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s new AppleCare One subscription lets you cover multiple products with a single plan. Subscribers can also cover products that are up to four years old.

articles.title: Metroid Dread studio's recent console and Epic-exclusive action-adventure "underperformed" due to "increasingly selective consumers", says publisher - Eurogamer
articles.description: Blades of Fire, the dark fantasy action-adventure from Metroid Dread studio MercurySteam, has "underperformed" following its console and PC release.

articles.title: The Biggest PlayStation Game Of 2025 Is A Four-Year-Old Former Xbox Exclusive - Kotaku
articles.description: Forza Horizon 5 is said to have sold 3 million copies, pushing Monster Hunter World into second place

articles.title: NateTheHate states again that he believes Nintendo Direct happening this month - My Nintendo News
articles.description: Prominent video game leaker NateTheHate has doubled down on his statement that he believes a Nintendo Direct presentation is happening this month. He has said this a couple of times now and seem quite…

articles.title: 'There were days where I felt I could never leave': Intimate images of 'the real Hotel California' - BBC
articles.description: The most iconic stars of the 1970s flocked to Record Plant Studios. A new book offers a glimpse inside – and argues that The Eagles' time there inspired the US band's most famous song.
